name: NSDockTilePlugIn
desc: A set of methods implemented by plug-ins that allow an appâ€™s Dock tile to be customized while the app is not running.

items.name: func setDockTile(NSDockTile?)
items.desc: Invoked when the plug-in is first loaded and when the application is removed from the Dock.

items.name: func dockMenu() -> NSMenu?
items.desc: Invoked when the user causes the application's dock menu to be shown.
